The Federal Workforce Needs to Return to the Office This January, I introduced HR 139, the Stopping Home Office Work's Unproductive Problems (SHOW UP) Act, to stop the Biden Administration from cementing pandemic-era telework policies for federal agencies until it provides Congress with a viable plan to avoid the negative impacts of remote work. For years, Kentuckians have suffered from the federal government's detrimental telework policies for federal bureaucrats.
